text: Afrocanthium shabanii is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Tanzania. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae * Lovett, J. & Clarke, G.P. 1998. Canthium shabanii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Vanguerieae Category:Endemic flora of Tanzania Category:Vulnerable flora of Africa Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Afrocanthium shabanii
